site.description: The TaBuLeTa plugin, created over the Masters course of Alcemir Santos, will display a view that allows the users to add computational units (such as, classes, methods, and fields) to features they want to locate.

category-def.name: br.ufmg.dcc.tabuleta.category
category-def.label: TaBuLeTa
category-def.description: This category contains all of the TaBuLeTa plugin features
